card.name: Release Backlog
card.description:
h2. Stories in this Sprint
{{table query: SELECT Number, Name, Status, 'Story Points' WHERE Type = Story AND Sprint = THIS CARD}}
|\3. Total Points | {{value query: SELECT SUM('Story Points') WHERE Sprint = THIS CARD}} | |\3. Accepted Points | {{value query: SELECT SUM('Story Points') WHERE Sprint = THIS CARD AND Status = Accepted}} |
h2. Burndown
{{ data-series-chart conditions: Sprint = THIS CARD AND 'Type' = 'Task' cumulative: True
x-labels-start: THIS CARD.Start Date x-labels-end: THIS CARD.End Date x-labels-step: 1
x-title: Date y-title: Estimated Task Hours
chart-width: 800 plot-width: 550 chart-height: 320
series:
- label: Task Completion color: red line-width: 4 data: SELECT 'Date Task Completed', SUM('Estimated Hours') WHERE 'Date Task Completed' IS NOT NULL down-from: SELECT SUM('Estimated Hours') trend: false }}

card.name: Sprint 1
Sprint 2

property_definition.name: Owner
property_definition.description: Individual assigned to a work item
property_definition.property_values_description: Automatically generated from the team list

property_definition.name: Tfs Work Item
property_definition.description: Identifies the corresponding Work Item in TFS (if any)
